This film follows a bestselling horror writer who inadvertently gets tangled up in a dangerous plot after a fateful accident."

Starring Anupam Kher and Rekha. On the other hand, if you're up for a unique take on the romance genre, 'I Heart Huckabees' offers an engaging exploration of existential issues through the detective work of a husband-and-wife team played by Dustin Hoffman and Lily Tomlin."
